title: Group Therapy: I Told On My Friend For Cheating
description: Natasha called the show for Group Therapy today and had to confess that she told on her friend for cheating on her boyfriend. She was friends with both her and the BF at the time and ended up getting into a relationship with the boyfriend of the friend she was dating before tattling. Is she in the wrong? What should she do?
itunes:summary: Natasha called the show for Group Therapy today and had to confess that she told on her friend for cheating on her boyfriend. She was friends with both her and the BF at the time and ended up getting into a relationship with the boyfriend of the friend she was dating before tattling. Is she in the wrong? What should she do?
